problem:
Alice, Bob, and Claire are playing a game. At the start of the game, they are each holding a ball: Alice has a yellow ball, Bob has a purple ball, and Claire has a blue ball.
As the game progresses, pairs of players trade balls. First, Alice and Claire swap balls. Then, Bob and Claire swap balls. Finally, Alice and Claire swap balls. At the end of the game, Alice has the
Options:
(A) yellow ball
(B) purple ball
(C) blue ball
